text:
="preserve">Henrique Córdova (21 December 1938 – 15 November 2020) was a Brazilian politician. He was Governor of Santa Catarina from 1982 to 1983. He was born in São Joaquim, Brazil. He was a member of the Democratic Social Party.
Córdova died on 15 November 2020 in Lages, Brazil at the age of 81.
